Text.Page:
Dougal wants to meet with you to discuss a recent Azart incursion near the site of the Core’s destruction.

Meet Dougal at the Reliquary Station.

While she was monitoring Azart activity, Jelena found out something suspicious going on at the Core area.

Dougal wants to go and help Jelena.

! According to Jelena, the Draakons are gathering at a nearby outpost.

Although it was destroyed, the Core still might possess unknown power. They might be up to something."Where is Jelena?"

She was monitoring a few scattered bands of Draakons.

She asked for you when she found something strange going on.

I want you to head out there and support Jelena’s investigation.

I was waiting for you .

I've been keeping an eye on the Draakons, hoping to find their Commander’s location, when i noticed several troupes of Draakons gathering here.

We need to find out what they are up to.

Can you give me a hand?"That's why I'm here."

Thanks.

I'll put an end to them...no matter what it takes.

First, we need to figure out their marching orders.

Take out some of these Draakons hand search them for clues.

That's plenty. This should be enough.

Please deliver these to Dougal and ask him to decrypt them. I'm sure Dougal will send reinforcements when he...wait, what’s going on over there?“What is it?"

You may heve been a bit too successful. The Draakons are moving out!

I'll go after them, you take what you found to Dougal.

I'll contact the Reliquary Station later for help. See you then.
We need that information to figure out their battle plan.

Some sort of Draakon secret messages?

I'll get these decrypted right away.

. Head back to Jelena--I'll send reinforcements as soon as the decryption is finished.
<PCNAME>! We've located their gathering point!<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"Where is it?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

It's Verrak Fortress.

From what it says here, the Draakon Commander intends to restore the fortress.

Get to Jelena as fast as you can. She might be in danger!

I found this entrance while you were gone.

The Draakons went through here."A secret passage?"
They must be restoring the fortress to regain control of this area.<NEXTPAGEBUTTON>"What should we do?"</NEXTPAGEBUTTON>

We need to see what's in there.

If it’s their Commander is there...we'll get our revenge for Elleon's.
